# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
using ThreadPools

function pig_latinify(word::String)::String
    vowels = Set('aeiou')
    if startswith(word, any('aeiou'))
        return word * "way"
    else
        for (i, char) in enumerate(word)
            if char in vowels
                return word[i:end] * word[1:i-1] * "ay"
            end
        end
    end
end

function pig_latin_transformer(words::Vector{String})::Vector{String}
    result = Vector{String}(undef, length(words))
    pool = ThreadPools.CPUTPool()
    for (i, word) in enumerate(words)
        enqueue!(pool) do
            result[i] = pig_latinify(word)
        end
    end
    wait(pool)
    return result
end
```
